sourcesContent: import{jsx as r,Fragment as i}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{translate as e}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{useAuthenticator as o}from"@aws-amplify/ui-react-core";import{Alert as t}from"../../../primitives/Alert/Alert.js";const m=()=>{const{error:m}=o((r=>[r.error]));return r(i,{children:m?r(t,Object.assign({variation:"error",isDismissible:!0},{children:e(m)})):null})};export{m as RemoteErrorMessage};
